oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Rick Riman tapes - tape 3 of 5 - Side two channel one
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Bluegrass performances collected by Rick Riman. Clarence and Roland White with band from the Ash Grove club in Los Angeles, California in 1972. Continued from side one. Audio restricted. Contact for access.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Clarence White; Roland White; Bernie Leadon; Herb Pederson; Roger Bush;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:06) Louisiana Man (continued from side one) / (01:46) Old Joe Clark / (04:02) Salty Dog Blues - abrupt start / (06:39) Earl's Breakdown / (09:21) Sunny Side Of The Mountain / (12:19) If You're Ever Gonna Love Me / (14:50) Alabama Jubilee (Clarence White - guitar) / (18:13) Dark Hollow / (20:41) Brief recorded excerpt of I'm A Boy by The Who / (21:22) FILE END
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:isPartOf: Hand written content notes on paper inserted in tape box.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: White, Clarence, 1944-1973; White, Roland; Leadon, Bernie; Pederson, Herb; Bush, Roger; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
